<!-- Autogenerated from JSR docs. Do not edit directly. -->

> ⚠️ **Unstable**: This @std package is experimental and its API may change without a major version bump.

## Overview

<p>In-memory cache utilities, such as memoization and caches with different
expiration policies.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { memoize, <span class="pl-smi">LruCache</span>, <span class="pl-k">type</span> <span class="pl-smi">MemoizationCacheResult</span> } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/cache"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">const</span> cache <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">LruCache</span>&lt;<span class="pl-smi">string</span>, <span class="pl-smi">MemoizationCacheResult</span>&lt;<span class="pl-smi">bigint</span>&gt;&gt;(<span class="pl-c1">1000</span>);

<span class="pl-c">// fibonacci function, which is very slow for n &gt; ~30 if not memoized</span>
<span class="pl-k">const</span> fib <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-en">memoize</span>((n: <span class="pl-smi">bigint</span>): <span class="pl-smi">bigint</span> <span class="pl-c1">=&gt;</span> {
  <span class="pl-k">return</span> n <span class="pl-c1">&lt;=</span> <span class="pl-c1">2n</span> ? <span class="pl-c1">1n</span> : <span class="pl-en">fib</span>(n <span class="pl-c1">-</span> <span class="pl-c1">1n</span>) <span class="pl-c1">+</span> <span class="pl-en">fib</span>(n <span class="pl-c1">-</span> <span class="pl-c1">2n</span>);
}, { cache });

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">fib</span>(<span class="pl-c1">100n</span>), <span class="pl-c1">354224848179261915075n</span>);
</code></pre>
